Pixelium Design â€‹

Pixelium Design â€“ A pixel-art UI component library for Vue, built with TypeScript and Vite. Nostalgic aesthetics, tree-shakable components, dark and light themes, full type safety, ready to use right out of the box.

ğŸš€ Tech Stack â€‹

  • Vue 3 â€“ Full modern features âš—ï¸ including Composition API
  • TypeScript â€“ Built on TS type system âœ… for out-of-the-box type safety
  • Vite â€“ Lightning-fast cold start âš¡ + HMR ğŸ”¥, production build via Rollup ğŸ“¦
  • oxlint â€“ Blazing-fast Rust linter ğŸ¦€ to keep code quality & consistency âœ¨

ğŸ¨ Features â€‹

  • Pixel Aesthetics â€“ Retro pixel look ğŸ‘¾ with customizable resolution & palette ğŸ®
  • OKlab Palette â€“ Theme generator ğŸŒˆ based on the OKlab color model for one-click custom palettes ğŸ¨
  • Tree-shakable â€“ Each component individually exported ğŸ§©; unused code auto-dropped ğŸ—‘ï¸
  • Dark Mode â€“ Supports dark mode ğŸŒ™ following system preference or manual toggle ğŸ”¦
